item.title: Deep Learning/Machine Learning Reading List
item.description: Transformer Models Neural Networks Series: A well crafted and highly visual walkthrough of modern neural networks by 3Blue1Brown, culminating in an explanation of GPT models. Attention Is All You Need: This paper is the birth of the transformer model, which proceeded to completely take over deep learning. An Image Is Worth 16x16 Words: Dosovitskiy et al. showed that unmodified transformers could handle image data as well as text data and still acheive state of the art results.
